name: Night Run by Matto (A film by Zora)

metadata.name: Night Run by Matto (A film by Zora) 1
metadata.description:
This open edition mint is a collectible produced in collaboration with Zora who filmed and edited the piece. The video is meant to snapshot a moment in the creative process of the project and will be available to mint for free from now until the Night Run mint begins. Learn more at https://nightrun.art/

In this short film created by Zora we explore the world of Night Run, created by Matto and the team at Thousand Ant. Night Run is a conceptual art project which includes a motorcycle video game, an NFT project about imaginary AI powered fashion houses and a series of videos documenting the creation process.

The Night Run NFTs will interact with the game by allowing collectors to make aesthetic choices which affect the experience of all players. This brings part of the audience into a collaborative role of helping to curate the virtual space of the piece. The elements collectors will be able to change will include the music which plays on that route, which collections of artworks are randomized across the billboards of the city and certain color choices in the environment. The choices collectors make are saved and replicated across everyone who plays the game.
